key.name: pos-x
key.summary: The saved horizontal position of the window.
key.description: The saved horizontal position of the window.

key.name: pos-y
key.summary: The vertical position width of the window.
key.description: The saved vertical position of the window.

key.name: window-width
key.summary: The saved width of the window.
key.description: The saved width of the window. Must be greater than 750, or it will not take effect.

key.name: window-height
key.summary: The saved height of the window.
key.description: The saved height of the window. Must be greater than 500, or it will not take effect.

key.name: maximized
key.description: Wether the main window was maximized or not.

key.name: follow-redirects
key.summary: Makes a new request to redirect.
key.description: Specifies if a new request should be made if the previous got a 301 - Redirect Header.

key.name: use-proxy
key.summary: Use a proxy for every request.
key.description: Use a proxy for every request.

key.name: http-proxy
key.description: Specifies which HTTP Proxy to use.

key.name: https-proxy
key.description: Specifies which HTTPS Proxy to use.

key.name: use-userinformation
key.description: Sets the user credentials for a proxy server.

key.name: proxy-username
key.description: Specifies which user uses the proxy.

key.name: proxy-password
key.description: Specifies the password for the user of the proxy.

key.name: no-proxy
key.description: Specifies which domains should not be proxied.

key.name: maximum-redirects
key.description: Specifies how often a request can be redirected before the request is cancled.

key.name: timeout
key.description: Specifies how long a request should wait on a response before it's terminated.

key.name: proxy-uri
key.description: To which proxy the requests are sent.

key.name: dark-theme
key.description: Switch between Light and Dark theme.

key.name: data
key.description: Stores all requests items and the API version of the app in a JSON object.

key.name: use-default-font
key.description: Specifies if the system font shall be used.

key.name: font
key.description: Specifies which font shall be used.

key.name: editor-scheme
key.description: Specifies which color scheme shall be used for the editor.

key.name: current-environment
key.description: Specifies the name of the current environment.
